Articles.Content:
I am having a problem launching planes and rockets in ksp , every time i launch one it just shows me the control bits but just sticks on the ksp facility not on my plane plus wont let me use any of the controls, but just i have fully uninstalled ksp and have removed all personal data but to no avail please could someone have any advice on this as i have tried ever other forum to find something similar but no one else has.

i am using one mod BD weaponry

- - - Updated - - -

i have just reinstalled my game again with ought the mods and is working will try reinstalling the mods agian and see if problem re occurs

- - - Updated - - -

added some moddeds doesnt seem to have re-occured but will try adding in the ship i also had and seaing if that affects it

have added that ship again and the problem has re occurred (link to file) http://kerbalx.com/wolfedg/K-15D.craft (have followed guide to adding ships correctly)

will try removing the ship and seeing what happens.
romving it diddnt fix it will try full reset that should work is probably a problem with they file (please have a look at it)
Hi Arknid, are you sticking to the launchpad? This mostly happens with the level 2 pad and is a fault with the pad itself, you can try the fixes here or use other parts as feet such as decouplers.

this is only happining when using the runway and am in sandbox mode so everything is level 3

also i have added back my mods and the problem is still happining

im using BD weponary, kerbal constructs , ksideoceaniav and P.E.W

thanks for the resons though

- - - Updated - - -

*respond soz
It's hard to figure out what's going on here without seeing it, can you upload pics to imgur.com please, also please upload your save to a fileshare site.

Pictures of the actual problem happening. Not of your Space Center.

No that is the problem it just shows up my station with all the flight dials and gauges round they edge bit wont let me use them or show me my plane . But when I close and open the game it says the ship I launched never launched

how to recreat : go on my gmail and there is a list of files . add the mods and boom the same thing happens . also ive added my ksp save to there aswell for you to look at

i am playing on steam dont know if that whould make a difference

i am going to end this thread here as partially solved as ive removed the mod and all is now fine but if anyone has any knowledge of how to fix it to be able to run

BD weponary then please contact me [email protected]
